explains: adj. 有暴风雨的，风暴的；激烈的，冲动的；（海）波涛汹涌的，（天空）乌云密布的
wordGroup: stormy weather 暴风雨天气；暴风雪
stormy sea 波涛汹涌的海面

sentences.en: I'm afraid you're running a risk setting sail in such stormy weather.
sentences.cn: 挑上这么个暴风雨的天气出航，你恐怕太冒险了吧！

sentences.en: An old saying describes to this way: "Sound traveling far and wide, a stormy day will be tied."
sentences.cn: 有句古话是这样说的：“声飘千里，风雨欲来。”

sentences.en: Today's collection provides some amazing examples of stormy photography which can be very difficult to capture.
sentences.cn: 今日的合集提供了一些叹为观止的暴风雨摄影范例，这是非常难捕捉到。
